ThingDef.label: roe
ThingDef.description:
Delicate fish eggs harvested from a variety of aquatic species, roe is prized for its briny, rich flavor and smooth texture.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 3 roe jars requires 50 fish with an average value of 1.1, for a total value of 55, and sells for 50, giving a <color=#33CC33>63.33%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Value per work:</color> Recipe requires 10000 work, which results on a value per work of <color=#33CC33>0.02</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.1 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>500</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> Super hard to calculate, as it will depend on the fish acquired per day, which depends on size, pawn skill, etc.
